name: Barney Kessel
description: '''Barney Kessel''' (October 17, 1923 â€“ May 6, 2004) was an American [[Jazz guitar|jazz guitarist]]. Known in particular for his knowledge of chords and inversions and chord-based melodies, he was a member of many prominent jazz groups as well as a "first call" guitarist for studio, film, and television recording sessions. Kessel was a member of the group of [[session musicians]] informally known as [[The Wrecking Crew (music)|the Wrecking Crew]].
